skills.name: Active
skills.description:
[SP: 0][CD: 25s] Thrust ATK: Deal 50% ATK of Physical DMG.
Throw ATK: Deal 90% ATK + 1400% ATK of Physical DMG.
Counterstrike Throw: Deal 20% + 800% ATK of Physical DMG. Counterstrike Throw does not trigger weapon skill cooldown.

skills.name: Passive 1
skills.description:
When equipped by Palatinus Equinox,
Knight Form: Used as a lance.
Guardian Form: Used as a gunlance. Tapping weapon active will fire the gunlance, reload after 3 rounds:
1st Sequence: 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 300% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 300% ATK of Physical DMG
Firing after special attack will fire a coordinated blast:
[4th Basic ATK coordinated blast]: 220% ATK of Physical DMG.
[Palatinus Slash coordinated blast]: 3 x 400% ATK of Physical DMG.

skills.name: Passive 2
skills.description: Crit Rate +15%. Weapon skill Total DMG +30%, Physical DMG +15%.

skills.name: Passive 3
skills.description:
(Test V2)
Total DMG +20%. After evasion skill, Total DMG taken from behind is reduced by 35% for 12s. Can be refreshed.
